item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "It was the kind of scream that would be in a horror movie right before someone got chopped up into little bitty pieces." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Having someone this male next to her made her soul feel exhilarated and convey brazenly suggestive, female, liberal ideas to her inner id." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "She had to remember not to look at him when he smiled like that." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Help you? I’d lick you, and most girls would want to marry you if you so much as talked to them." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "This wasn’t the Dark Ages, and she wasn’t living in a third world nation where women didn’t have any rights and were treated unequally." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "That sounded sweet enough to almost be intelligent, but it was chauvinistic as hell." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "She could end up on the news if she wasn’t careful, with her face plastered on the back of milk jugs. Missing and too stupid to live." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Every woman needs a man." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Barbaric is letting the woman suffer to be alone for the rest of her life." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Men were born to protect and love, and our women help us to serve a higher purpose." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "It was like he was a caveman grunting, "You woman. Me man. Let’s make babies together." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "The supernova sun would be cooler than the fire lighting our desire." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Two blue men the size of football players walking through a store wrapped in Roman gladiator armor was bound to attract attention." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "You call this a chariot?" -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Driving in your world seems a bit dangerous." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Earth girls aren’t easy." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Two is always better than one." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "You might be able to kiss like a rock star, but you’ve got to get over this macho trip. You don’t own me." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "You can’t walk around here half naked in Roman warrior costumes or every woman in a fifty-mile radius will be on you like flies on honey." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "We don’t have a Giant Aliens “R” Us or we’d be there." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "She seemed to enjoy the control and picked out some stretch blue jeans that hugged his ass tighter than a pair of kissing Proulahs. On his world, once mated, the blue crustaceans shared a shell for the rest of their life in an eternal kiss." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Lily closed her eyes and screamed at the top of her lungs as she made the scariest fall of her life, plunging to her certain death while clinging to her rescuer who really didn’t rescue her at all." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description:
"Didn’t I tell you that you would be safe as long as you were with me?”
“Yes, but I didn’t believe you when you pushed me off the edge of a building." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "I feel alive when you kiss me." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "Synthetic chocolate sounds wrong." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Missy Lyons
item.description: "There was an electric buzzing sound that was constantly on, acting as background music like a million cicadas in the forest. A constant white noise." -- Missy Lyons

item.title: Missy add a quote by Roald Amundsen
item.description: "Adventure is just bad planning." -- Roald Amundsen

item.title: Missy add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "If you run from me, I will chase you, and I'll find you...." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Missy add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I declare after all there is no enjoyment like reading! How much sooner one tires of any thing than of a book! -- When I have a house of my own, I shall be miserable if I have not an excellent library." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Missy add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "You know that old saying. Once you go dead, no one's better in bed." -- Jeaniene Frost
